room.name: The Beginning Room
room.desc: You are in a dark room.

room.name: The Second Room
room.desc: Things look a bit better here. You see a waterfall ahead in the distance, but the developers will have to decide if you can get to it or not. There is a tree here.
room.focus: It looks like you can go inside the waterfall!

room.name: In the Tree
room.desc: You are at the top of the tree.

item.name: a delicious chocolate chunk cookie
item.short: A delicious cholocate chunk cookie sits here.
item.desc: The cookie has a delicious, gooey smell of freshly-baked dough.

denizen.name: a penguin
denizen.short: A penguin waddles around your feet.
denizen.desc: The penguin is waddling about, looking for attention from wherever it may come. He also appears hungry, perhaps for herring or shrimp.
